name: lpc-remote-editor
description: Enables creators on an LP MUD to remotely edit code through VS Code

configuration.title: LPC Remote Editor for LP MUDs

[lpc-remote-ed].uri.title: Host
[lpc-remote-ed].uri.description: The uri used to connect to the MUD

[lpc-remote-ed].userName.title: User Name
[lpc-remote-ed].userName.description: The MUD username to use for the connection

[lpc-remote-ed].password.title: Password
[lpc-remote-ed].password.description: The MUD password to use for the connection

[lpc-remote-ed].useOutputChannel.title: Use Debug Output Channel
[lpc-remote-ed].useOutputChannel.description: Creates a channel in the Output Window containing debugging information.
